snippet.title: Transforming Ourselves Through Learn[in]
snippet.description:
* Kelly Palmer
Transforming Ourselves Through Learn[in] Kelly Palmer January 24, 2013
Editor’s Note: Once a month, we set aside a Friday for employees to focus on investing in themselves and their community. This month, our inDay theme was “Learn[In]” so we asked our Global Leader of Learning & Development Kelly Palmer to talk about new learning initiatives her team just launched for LinkedIn employees. At LinkedIn, talent is our #1 priority and we’re focused on helping our employees transform the trajectory of their careers. The Global Learning…
* Topics: * LinkedIn Indays
